Hi, I'm Jannik Weyrich.

Entrepreneur and coder. Combining both in my current position as founder & CTO of Particulate. I studied at the University of Koblenz, Germany (MSc of Business and Computer Science).

I'm interesed in technology, traveling, football and music

Work

Some projects I work(ed) on

Socialfunders

Socialfunders is the project I'm currently working on. It's a large Django application empowering charity projects to collect money from companies.

The company behind Socialfunders is Particulate.

Kennzeichen

First Android app I ever wrote. Now > 500,000 Downloads from Germany, Russia, India, Italy, France, Austria, Switzerland, and Poland. Very simple yet useful to a lot of people.

Play Store Link

My studies

My Masters thesis (Business and Computer Science): Mobile Cross Platform Application Development for B2B Companies. My Bachelors thesis (Information Management): Inventory Manangement aided by mobile Applications and RFID.
